trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnecting" /> and <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnecting" /> events.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce i dati per gli eventi <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnecting" /> e <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnecting" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnecting> event is raised by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartsConnecting%2A> method, and it indicates that the connection process has begun (for example, a user has selected a control and clicked a connect verb), but is not yet completed.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnecting> evento viene generato dal <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartsConnecting%2A> (metodo) e indica che ha iniziato il processo di connessione (ad esempio, un utente ha selezionato un controllo e fa clic su un verbo di connessione), ma non è ancora stata completata.

trans-unit.source: The event provides an opportunity to cancel a connection before it is complete.
trans-unit.target: L'evento fornisce la possibilità di annullare una connessione prima del completamento.

trans-unit.source: If the connection is successfully completed, this event is followed by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnected> event.
trans-unit.target: Se la connessione viene completata correttamente, questo evento è seguito dal <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnected> evento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnecting> event is raised by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartsDisconnecting%2A> method, and it indicates that a user has clicked a disconnect verb, or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisconnectWebParts%2A> method has otherwise been called.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnecting> evento viene generato dal <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartsDisconnecting%2A> (metodo) e indica che un utente ha fatto clic su un verbo di disconnessione o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisconnectWebParts%2A> in caso contrario la chiamata a metodo.

trans-unit.source: The event provides an opportunity to cancel the process of ending a connection before it is complete.
trans-unit.target: L'evento fornisce la possibilità di annullare il processo di chiusura di una connessione prima del completamento.

trans-unit.source: If the connection is ended successfully, this event is followed by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnected> event.
trans-unit.target: Se la connessione viene chiusa correttamente, questo evento è seguito dal <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnected> evento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsCancelEventArgs> class contains information about the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnecting> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnecting> events.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsCancelEventArgs> classe contiene informazioni sul <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnecting> e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnecting> eventi.

trans-unit.source: It provides access to the Web Parts controls that are being connected or disconnected.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce accesso ai controlli Web part che viene collegato o scollegato.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsCancelEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsCancelEventArgs" />.

trans-unit.source: The Web Parts control providing data in the connection.
trans-unit.target: Controllo Web part che fornisce i dati nella connessione.

trans-unit.source: The connection point for providing data.
trans-unit.target: Punto di connessione per i dati forniti.

trans-unit.source: The Web Parts control consuming data in the connection.
trans-unit.target: Controllo Web part che utilizza i dati nella connessione.

trans-unit.source: The connection point for consuming data.
trans-unit.target: Punto di connessione per i dati utilizzati.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsCancelEventArgs" /> class without a specified connection.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsCancelEventArgs" /> senza una connessione specificata.

trans-unit.source: The Web Parts control providing data in the connection.
trans-unit.target: Controllo Web part che fornisce i dati nella connessione.

trans-unit.source: The connection point for providing data.
trans-unit.target: Punto di connessione per i dati forniti.

trans-unit.source: The Web Parts control consuming data in the connection.
trans-unit.target: Controllo Web part che utilizza i dati nella connessione.

trans-unit.source: The connection point for consuming data.
trans-unit.target: Punto di connessione per i dati utilizzati.

trans-unit.source: The Web Parts connection involved in the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnecting" /> or <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnecting" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Connessione Web part coinvolta nell'evento <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnecting" /> o <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnecting" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsCancelEventArgs" /> class with the specified connection.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsCancelEventArgs" /> con la connessione specificata.

trans-unit.source: Gets the Web Parts connection involved in the event.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene la connessione Web part coinvolta nell'evento.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" /> involved in the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnecting" /> or <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnecting" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Classe <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" /> coinvolta nell'evento <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnecting" /> o <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnecting" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the Web Parts control acting as the consumer in the connection.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il controllo Web part che agisce come consumer nella connessione.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> acting as the consumer in the connection.
trans-unit.target: Controllo <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> che agisce come consumer nella connessione.

trans-unit.source: Gets the connection point that consumes data in the Web Parts connection.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il punto di connessione che utilizza i dati nell'insieme Web part.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the Web Parts control acting as the provider in the connection.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il controllo Web part che agisce come provider nella connessione.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> acting as the provider in the connection.
trans-unit.target: Controllo <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> che agisce come provider nella connessione.

trans-unit.source: Gets the connection point that provides data in the Web Parts connection.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il punto di connessione che fornisce i dati nell'insieme Web part.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint" />.
